body: Well there's never going to be `torch.c10`, so I'm not sure which top level do you have in mind. I  think that if we want to let people use process groups as first class objects in their code, then they should just go under `torch.distributed.<some_readable_name_here>`. `c10d` is certainly not a very nice name for a Python module
